articles.title: CPRK Spokesman Blasts Lee Myung Bak's Talk about Dialogue
articles.content:
CPRK Spokesman Blasts Lee Myung Bak's Talk about Dialogue
 Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea gave the following answer to a question put by KCNA Thursday ridiculing the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for pretending to be interested in improving the north-south relations, talking about "dialogue":
					 From the outset of the new year, Lee trumpeted about "opening the window of opportunity" and "defusing mutual distrust." While touring a foreign country, he let loose a spate of jargons to give impression that he was interested in improving the north-south relations and dialogue, crying out for "joint efforts for preserving stability and peace" on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Ryu U Ik, puppet minister of Unification, and other minions are so shameless as to utter that they hope "the north will come out for dialogue" and "the south will work to improve the south-north relations", talking about "opening the channel of dialogue".
					
					 The group of traitors rubbed salt into the wounds of the fellow countrymen deeply grieving the untimely demise of the great father and hurled muds at the tears shed during the mourning period. Nevertheless, the group, far from making an apology for its high treason, shamelessly cried out for dialogue. This is an unpardonable mockery and insult to the Korean people.
					
					 While paying lip-service to "dialogue," the Lee group more openly revealed its sinister intention to escalate confrontation, asserting "there is no change in the basic policy toward the north" and "it will play a leading role, sticking to the essence of the policy toward the north". Worse still, it dared preposterously call for someone's "change" and "choice", persistently peddling the "Cheonan" warship case the hypocritical nature of which had already been brought to light.
					
					 Despite accusations at home and abroad, Lee did not dismiss Kim Thae Hyo, a vicious anti-reunification and confrontation-minded element of Chongwadae, but promoted him. And he inspected a unit of the puppet army in the area along the Military Demarcation Line, malignantly slandering the DPRK as "hostile forces" and fanning up fever of a war of aggression against the north. This indicates that Lee is more viciously challenging the DPRK with a dagger in his belt.
					
					 Clear is the aim sought by the group in trumpeting about dialogue at present as it was dead-set against the DPRK's proposal for wide-ranging north-south dialogue and negotiations. It is aimed to calm down the surging resentment of the people of the DPRK and all other fellow countrymen at the group of traitors who committed the high treason, diverse elsewhere the south Korean people's hatred now on the point of eruption, mislead public opinion at home and abroad, tide over the ruling crisis and smoothly hold elections.
					
					 The Lee group is the gang of traitors without equals as it has driven the inter-Korean relations into an uncontrollable catastrophe by committing all sorts of wrongs in the four years of its office.    Ridiculous, indeed, is the attempt of this group to use the sacred north-south dialogue for attaining its despicable political goal and prolonging its remaining days.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group would be well advised to make an apology to the whole nation for the high treason committed during the mourning over the great loss to the nation before talking about hypocritical dialogue.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Mahmoud Abbas
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Mahmoud Abbas
 Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from Mahmoud Abbas, chief of the Palestinian National Authority, with the approach of the lunar New Year, Juche 101.
					 The floral basket was handed over to an official concerned by Palestinian Ambassador to the DPRK Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan on Thursday.

articles.title: Performance of Moranbong, Wangjaesan Art Troupes
articles.content:
Performance of Moranbong, Wangjaesan Art Troupes
 Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) -- Moranbong and Wangjaesan art troupes gave a performance before full house at the People's Palace of Culture.
					 Enjoying it were officials of ministries and national institutions, creators and artistes of army artistic organizations and officials and working people in the city of Pyongyang.
					
					 Its numbers included female solo and pangchang "Sound of Bell", female sextet "Glory to Our Great Party", female duet and pangchang "A Day of His", light music "Let's Sing of Our Pride in Being under the Guidance of the General" and dance "Snowflake".
					
					 Through songs and dances the performers represented the strong stamina of the Korean army and people to hold General Secretary Kim Jong Il in high esteem forever and work hard for shining victory in 2012 as his soldiers and disciples as well as their iron will to keep up the footsteps of the Korean revolution started on Mt. Paektu with the footsteps for Songun victory.
					
					 The performance was acclaimed by the audience as it was perfect in every aspect by realizing the idea of the Workers' Party of Korea on music building in the new century.

articles.title: DPRK's Acrobatics Dominates Intl' Circus Festival
articles.content:
DPRK's Acrobatics Dominates Intl' Circus Festival
 Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) -- Gold prize, top prize, went to the DPRK's acrobatic stunt "Fliers," silver prize to "Fly Higher", bronze prize to "String-balance" and technique prize to "Wire Rope Balancing" at the 6th Valencia International Circus Festival which took place in Valencia of Spain from Jan. 13 to 15. 
					 It brought together famous acrobats from the DPRK, Russia, Spain, Italy, Britain, France, the Czech Republic, Bulgaria, Romania and Mexico.
					
					 Put on the stage were at least 20 numbers selected from more than 30 numbers presented to the international joint circus held in Valencia from Dec. 3 last year to Jan. 8 this year.
					
					 A ceremony of awarding those prizes to Korean acrobats took place on Jan. 15.

articles.title: Indian Embassy Officials Enjoy Art Performance
articles.content:
Indian Embassy Officials Enjoy Art Performance
 Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) -- Charge d'Affaires ad Interim Rajesh Kumar Aherwar and staff members of the Indian embassy here enjoyed an art performance of Moranbong and Wangjaesan art troupes of the DPRK at the People's Palace of Culture Thursday on the Day of the Republic of India.
					 They were moved to watch the performance overflowing with deep reverence for General Secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: "Selected Works of Kim Jong Il" Published
articles.content:
"Selected Works of Kim Jong Il" Published
Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House brought out Vol. 14 (enlarged version) of "Selected Works of Kim Jong Il" which comprehends famous works of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Contained in the book are 10 works including historic speeches, talks and letters he made public in the period from October 1990 to May 1991.
					
					 The works deal with the Juche idea and the idea and theory on the originality, advantage and vitality of Korean-style socialism based on it and theoretical and practical matters arising in accelerating the Juche-oriented party building and the construction of socialist economy and culture.
					
					 In the work "Let Us Strengthen Party Cells" Kim Jong Il gave perfect answers to the principled questions arising in building up and steadily strengthening the party-cells, the lowest organizations of the WPK.
					
					 Among them are works "Socialism in Our Country Is the Korean-style Socialism Which Embodied the Juche Idea" and "Our Socialism Centered on the Masses Shall Not Perish" which clarify the intrinsic nature and advantage of Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses.
					
					 The work "Theory of Dancing Art" is a library on the Juche-based dancing art as it systematizes and comprehends in an integrated way the unique ideas and theories on socialist dancing art.
					
					 In his work "Theory of Architectural Art" Kim Jong Il provided highly important guidelines that should be always adhered to in the work to create socialist architecture.
					
					 There are "On Improving the Work for Music Creation and Dissemination" and other works which clarify the ways for creating and disseminating many literary and art works based on socialist reality that are conducive to rallying the party members and other working people around the WPK and the leader.

articles.title: KCNA Denounces Lee Myung Bak's Reckless Behavior
articles.content:
KCNA Denounces Lee Myung Bak's Reckless Behavior 
 Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) -- Lee Myung Bak's hysteria for confrontation with compatriots has reached its height. 
					 Lee, touring a frontline unit on Wednesday, blustered that "the north shows a very bellicose posture" and the Korean Peninsula is a "divided country where exist the most warlike forces in the world." 
					
					 He went the lengths of crying out for "taking strong posture for counter-action to deter the north from provocation." 
					
					 This is an unpardonable insult to the mourners in the north still in unbearable sorrow and grief over the loss of the great father of the nation and an act adding to his crimes. 
					
					 As far as "bellicose nature of the north" touted by Lee Myung Bak is concerned, it is an eruption of anger of the service personnel and people of the DPRK at the worst confrontation and war monger who drove the situation of the Korean Peninsula to the brink of war by insulting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK during the mourning period of the nation. 
					
					 Lee brought into bolder relief his true colors as anti-DPRK confrontation maniac and human scum by rubbing salt into the wounds of the grief-stricken compatriots. 
					
					 He issued an order to the whole puppet army to "be on emergency combat alert" and reinforced and deployed armed forces around the five islands in the West Sea of Korea and the frontline areas. 
					
					 His group worked out even an "emergency plan" for coping with a probable incident, letting loose extremely provocative remarks that "the north may make provocations for rallying its internal forces" and "field commanders should decisively punish any provocation according to their judgment and decision". 
					
					 As seen above, even during the mourning period the group of traitors leveled guns at the fellow countrymen and brandished swords against them, revealing their intention to do harm to the DPRK. These were the monstrous crimes which could be committed only by those steeped in the consciousness of confrontation with the DPRK to the marrow of their bones. 
					
					 That was why south Korean people from all walks of life denounced the Lee group, querying "is there anyone to initiate a war during mourning period and is there any depraved guy issuing an emergency alert to a mourner's house?"
					
					 The Lee group committed such thrice-cursed crimes as refusing to express condolences, groundlessly shifting the "final responsibility" for the sinking of the warship "Cheonan" and shelling of Yonphyong Island onto the supreme leadership of the DPRK. 
					
					 This compelled the service personnel and people of the DPRK to harden their will not to deal with Lee Myung Bak group for good and force him to pay for all his treasons.
					
					 What he uttered about "bellicose nature" of someone touring the frontline area this time is nothing but sheer sophism to cover up the above-said high treasons. In other words, it is no more than a foolish artifice to evade the responsibility for bedeviling the inter-Korean relations and driving the situation to the brink of war. 
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK will mercilessly punish those warmongers who hurt the great and sacred dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and the noble feelings and determination to protect it to the last and who are keen to destroy Korean style socialism.

articles.title: 18th Memorial Service for Rev. Mun Ik Hwan Held in S. Korea
articles.content:
18th Memorial Service for Rev. Mun Ik Hwan Held in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) -- The 18th memorial service for Rev. Mun Ik Hwan was held in Kyonggi Province of south Korea on Jan. 14.
					 Present there were bereaved families of the reverend, members of civic and public organizations and personages of different circles.
					
					 Kim Hui Son, director of the "Embracing National Reunification", Ri Kang Sil, permanent co-representative of the Solidarity for Progress, Kwon O Hon, honorary chairman of the Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy, and others made speeches.
					
					 The speakers looked back upon the positive efforts made by Mun for national reunification.
					
					 They said that the reunification which he was yearning so ardently has not yet come true due to the Lee Myung Bak's "government" and the "Grand National Party".
					
					 They said that people from all walks of life would get united to put an end to the confrontation policy of the Lee Myung Bak's "government" against the fellow countrymen and implement the June 15 joint declaration and thus achieve peaceful reunification.

articles.title: Inter-Korean Cooperation in Media Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Inter-Korean Cooperation in Media Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) -- The Media Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration called its steering commission meeting in Seoul on Jan. 16, at which it declared that it would dynamically propel the north-south exchange and cooperation in media this year.
					 Pak Jong Ryul, permanent co-representative of the Headquarters, in his speech at the meeting noted that the north-south cooperation and exchange in media has been checked since the emergence of the Lee Myung Bak "government".
					
					 Media has a very big role to play in ensuring peace and security of the nation this year, he said, stressing that the organization would intensify the media activities for reunification.

articles.title: DPRK's Joint New Year Editorial Supported
articles.content:
DPRK's Joint New Year Editorial Supported 
 Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) -- The Executive Committee of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia and organizations of Russia and Peru issued statements in support of the joint New Year editorial of the DPRK.
					 The Executive Committee of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia in a statement on Jan. 11 said that the joint editorial demonstrated the fixed faith and will of the Korean people to invariably advance along the road of revolutionary changes. 
					
					 It went on:
					
					 It is thanks to the grand blueprint unrolled by General Secretary Kim Jong Il that 2012 will be adorned with victories and the DPRK will turn more splendid to suit the appearance of a thriving nation.
					
					 We support the stand of the Workers' Party of Korea to place the interests common to the nation before anything else and subordinate everything to them.
					
					 We believe that all the tasks set forth in the editorial will be successfully implemented. 
					
					 The Karelia-DPRK Friendship Association of Russia, the Karelia Branch of the Russian Veterans Fund, the Karelia Branch of the Movement for Supporting the Army, the Karelia Branch of the Navy Veterans Union and the Karelia Branch of the International Soviet Officers Union in a joint statement on Jan. 10 wished the DPRK great successes in the struggle to develop the economy of the country and improve the standard of people's living on the occasion of the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The Kim Jong Suk Library in Peru in a statement on Jan. 9 supported the Korean people in their struggle to reunify the country independently and peacefully under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The statement denounced the moves of the anti-DPRK, anti-reunification forces and strongly demanded the U.S. forces, the main obstacle to the peace on the Korean Peninsula, be withdrawn from south Korea.
					
					  It supported the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and expressed solidarity with the just cause of the Korean people to reunify the country.

articles.title: Bird and Flower Plant in Foreign Country Seem to Mourn Demise of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Bird and Flower Plant in Foreign Country Seem to Mourn Demise of Kim Jong Il 
 Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) -- A natural wonder happened in Germany, too, when the whole world was in great sorrow over the demise of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 At around 3:00 PM on Dec. 20, the day after the news of the passing of the leader was released, a grate titmouse settled before the entrance of the DPRK embassy in Germany and stayed there, pecking at the glass.
					
					 There were visits of an endless crowd of people to the mourning place, but the bird was staring at it for an hour before flying away.
					
					 Meanwhile, a prunus mume around the embassy premise had been in full bloom in the whole mourning period despite chilly weather.
					
					 Witnesses said: It was a rare phenomenon which was not observed before. It seemed that upon hearing the sad news of the demise of the outstanding great man the bird flew to the mourning station to express condolences and flew away after standing vigil. The prunus mume came into bloom in such cold winter day in token of mourning his demise.

articles.title: China Slashes U.S. Decision to Impose Sanction on Chinese Company
articles.content:
China Slashes U.S. Decision to Impose Sanction on Chinese Company
 Beijing, January 18 (KCNA) -- China on Saturday voiced its "strong dissatisfaction and firm opposition" to the United States' decision to impose sanction on a Chinese company, the Zhuhai Zhenrong Corp.
					 "As many other countries, China maintained normal cooperation with Iran in energy, economy and trade fields," Foreign Ministry spokesman Liu Weimin said when asked to comment on the sanction.
					
					 The United States attempted to internationalize its unilateral sanction measures against Iran, and to implement sanction against the Chinese company according to its domestic law, "which is groundless," Liu said.

articles.title: U.S. Move to Dominate World Censured by Russian
articles.content:
U.S. Move to Dominate World Censured by Russian
 Moscow, January 18 (KCNA) -- The secretary of the Security Council of the Russian Federation in a recent interview with a news service accused the U.S. of still seeking chance to dominate the world politically, economically and militarily.
					 Though a lot of changes have taken place in the world the U.S. is persistently attempting to realize its domination over the world, the secretary noted, disclosing that the present U.S. administration has tried to contain China and occupy the resources of Russia after adopting the Asian-Pacific region as a main target of its foreign policy.
					
					 Russia has difference with the U.S. in views to main issues including the missile defence system in Europe, the secretary said, adding that China, too, is opposed to the U.S. plan for establishment of MD in the world.

articles.title: President Ahmadinejad: LatAm Will No Longer Be US' Backyard
articles.content:
President Ahmadinejad: LatAm Will No Longer Be US' Backyard
 Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) -- Iran's President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad said during his recent visit to Ecuador "I want to declare officially that from now on, Latin America will no longer be the backyard of the US".
					 Iranian President Ahmadinejad made the remarks in a joint press conference in presence of his Ecuadorian Counterpart Rafael Correa in Quito.
					
					 The Latin American people possess a culture, a civilization, dignity and a good future, President Ahmadinejad said.
					
					 "I advise the bullying powers to respect other nations and recognize their rights," he said.

articles.title: Iran Warns Gulf States over Crude Boosts to Offset Potential Oil Embargo
articles.content:
Iran Warns Gulf States over Crude Boosts to Offset Potential Oil Embargo
 Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) -- Iran's OPEC governor warned against any crude boosts by Persian Gulf states to compensate for the potential Western embargo on Iran's oil exports, the local satellite Press TV reported on Sunday.
					 If the Gulf countries be prudent enough to announce that they will not participate in an oil embargo against Iran, the "adventurous" Western countries will be dissuaded from imposing oil sanctions against Iran, he added.
					
					 The regional countries should not align themselves with the West's sanctions, he stressed.

articles.title: Iranian FM Censures Israeli Nuclear Ambition
articles.content:
Iranian FM Censures Israeli Nuclear Ambition
 Tehran, January 18 (KCNA) -- Iranian Foreign Minister Ali Akbar Salehi strongly condemned the dangerous nuclear ambition of Israel at a diplomatic meeting on Jan. 16.
					 There is no country having nuclear weapons in the Middle East except the Zionist regime, he said, adding that Iran has long called for the Middle East free from nuke.
					
					 The Zionist regime has steadily stockpiled nuclear warheads, endangering the Mideast peace and security, he charged, calling on the international community to focus its attention on this issue.

articles.title: Iran Dismisses Western Media Hype over Strait of Hormuz: Commander
articles.content:
Iran Dismisses Western Media Hype over Strait of Hormuz: Commander
 Tehran, January 18 (KCNA) -- Iranian Navy Commander Rear Admiral Habibollah Sayyari on Sunday dismissed Western media hype that Iran's "Velayat 90" naval drill was designed to show Iran's ability to close the Strait of Hormuz.
					 The commander condemned attempts to incite Iranophobia in regional states, stressing that the global arrogance seeks to introduce Iran's growing military might as a threat to the region. 
					
					 He called for vigilance to thwart attempts by certain Western powers to foment tension in the Persian Gulf region, pointing out that Iran is ready to conduct joint drills with other regional and neighboring countries.

articles.title: Iran's Foreign Ministry Spokesman on Aims of Anti-Iran Sanctions
articles.content:
Iran's Foreign Ministry Spokesman on Aims of Anti-Iran Sanctions
 Tehran, January 18 (KCNA) -- Iran's Foreign Ministry spokesman said on Sunday that the U.S. and other Western countries' sanctions on Iran are aimed to bust up their economic rivals in Asia.
					 The U.S. is seeking to stay the economic growth of its rivals by destabilizing the energy market through sanctions on Iran's oil industry, he pointed out.
					
					 Asian countries will not throw out their national interests bowing to the U.S. political pressure, he said, stressing that Iran is never worrying over the U.S.'s sanctions.

articles.title: Anti-Iran Sanctions Destabilizing Oil Market
articles.content:
Anti-Iran Sanctions Destabilizing Oil Market
 Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) -- OPEC will not get involved in the standoff between Iran and Western powers over Iran's nuclear program, Venezuela's oil minister said at a recent press conference on Monday.
					 He said the sanctions are causing instability in the market.

articles.title: Occupy Capitol Hill Demo in U.S.
articles.content:
Occupy Capitol Hill Demo in U.S.
 Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) -- Many Americans staged a Occupy Capitol Hill demo in Washington on Jan. 17 despite the cold weather to protest the ruling quarters' unpopular policy.
					 The demonstrators marched up to the Capitol Hill and held a protest rally, chanting such slogans as "We are the 99%" and "We want changes".
					
					 They valiantly fought against the police cracking down on them.
					
					 The organizers of the demonstration stated that the demo was aimed to show one percent Congress what is democracy.

articles.title: Chadian President Urges Integration at Central Africa Summit
articles.content:
Chadian President Urges Integration at Central Africa Summit
 Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) -- Chadian President Idriss Deby Itno said integration is the only tool to benefit the Central African.
					 The president was speaking in N'Djamena late Sunday at the opening of the 15th summit of the Economic Community of Central African States (CEEAC).
					
					 Deby Itno asked his CEEAC colleagues to abandon their ego and their nationalism for the benefit of regional integration which will benefit their populations.
					
					 Deby asked his colleagues to "carry out the necessary reforms which will transform their regional community to be a viable social and economic bloc that will also be competitive internationally."

articles.title: Pakistan Rejects U.S. Inquiry Report on NATO Attack
articles.content:
Pakistan Rejects U.S. Inquiry Report on NATO Attack
 Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) -- Pakistan has rejected a U.S. Central Command report on inquiry into the November 26, 2011 NATO air strikes on two Pakistan border posts which had killed 24 Pakistani soldiers.
					 The U.S. report claimed that Pakistani forces had first fired at NATO forces in Afghanistan, which promoted air strikes by the U.S. fighter jets and helicopters.
					
					 Pakistani Prime Minister Yusuf Raza Gilani presided over the meeting of Defense Committee of the Cabinet (DCC) late Saturday which formally rejected the U.S. report.
					
					 Gilani said that regret expressed by the U.S. and NATO officials over the killing of 24 Pakistani soldiers was insufficient.
					
					 The DCC demanded apology from the U.S. and NATO over the deaths of Pakistani soldiers.
					
					 The meeting also renewed demand that the U.S. military stop drone strikes in Pakistan's northwestern tribal regions.

articles.title: Mongolian President Calls for Wider Use of Traditional Script
articles.content:
Mongolian President Calls for Wider Use of Traditional Script
 Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) -- Mongolian President Tsakhiagiin Elbegdorj on Monday appealed for increased use of the country's traditional script.
					 Elbegdorj said promotion of traditional Mongolian script should be duty of every Mongolian president and senior leaders of the state, as it was one of the cultural values of the Mongolian people.
					
					 "Making traditional script a part of everyday life requires time and effort," he said.

articles.title: Ukrainian FM Calls for Peaceful Settlement of Iran's Nuclear Issue
articles.content:
Ukrainian FM Calls for Peaceful Settlement of Iran's Nuclear Issue
 Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) -- Ukrainian Foreign Minister Konstantin Grishchenko in his recent article called for peaceful settlement of Iran's nuclear issue. 
					 He stressed the need to solve the issue through dialogue as the tension over Iran's nuclear program is arousing concern. 
					
					 Armed conflict between Iran and the West will bring skyrocketing of oil price and disasters worldwide, he warned.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un inspecciona la Unidad 169 del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un inspecciona la Unidad 169 del EPC
Pyongyang, 19 de enero (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea y Maximo Dirigente del partido, el Estado y el pueblo de Corea, inspecciono la Unidad 169 del EPC que recibio el titulo de Septimo Regimiento de O Jung Hup.
					Le acogieron el comandante de la gran unidad combinada y los otros de la unidad.
					
					Tras recibir el parte de recepcion, respondio con su mano a las aclamaciones de los militares emocionados por tenerle en su unidad y se retrato con ellos.
					
					Guiado por los comandantes, paso revista al monumento a la historia revolucionaria y un manantial.
					
					Durante su visita a la unidad realizada en mayo de 1998, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il se habia mostrado muy satisfecho de que la comandancia de la unidad haya sido acondicionada pintorescamente como una casa de reposo en el lugar apropiado, escogido personalmente por el Presidente Kim Il Sung visitandolo 5 veces.
					
					En las salas de educacion en la historia revolucionaria y de presentacion del historial, el Comandante Supremo recordo con gran emocion las inmortales hazanas de direccion del Presidente y el Dirigente, registradas en la orgullosa trayectoria de la unidad que brilla por sus meritos heroicos.
					
					En noviembre del ano pasado, ultimo periodo de su vida, el Dirigente tomo una foto de recuerdo con los militares cumpliendo la promesa que les hizo en su anterior visita de hace 4 anos, senalo.
					
					Sin olvidar esa benevolencia, los militares de esta unidad deben realizar bien el entrenamiento militar-politico para recompensar la confianza del Dirigente quien los situo al frente de todo el ejercito llamando su unidad como destacamento de tigres del monte Paektu, dijo.
					
					Acto seguido, el Comandante Supremo hizo conocimiento del estado de ejercicios militares de la unidad.
					
					Subrayando que la unidad tiene una mision muy importante, indico las tareas programaticas que serviran de directiva en centuplicar la combatividad de ella.
					
					El primer deber del militar con armas es ejercitar bien, reitero y agrego que hay que concentrar todas las fuerzas en intensificar los ejercicios, sobre todo, preparar a los uniformados de la unidad como soldados omnipotentes que puedan cumplir independiente y satisfactoriamente cualquier mision.
					
					En su recorrido por la casa de los militares y la biblioteca, se mostro satisfecho de que se realizara originalmente con diversos materiales e instalaciones la educacion ideo-politica conforme a las caracteristicas de los militares.
					
					Destaco que hay que seguir prestando primera atencion a la educacion politica e ideologica sobre los militares para formarlos como fuertes en la idea y conviccion.
					
					Presenciando las fotos de los heroes de combate, vaticino que apareceran en el futuro mucho mas heroes y agrego que la unidad debe impulsar bien la educacion con los datos referentes a los meritos de combate para convertir a todos los militares en heroes.
					
					Ante las fotos de los oficiales llamados carinosamente como "nuestros", el Comandante Supremo reconocio la abnegacion de ellos quienes atienden con amor fraternal la vida de los soldados considerandolos como companeros de armas revolucionarios.
					
					Seguidamente, estuvo en el comedor donde vio el plan de celebracion del "Dia para los soldados" y volvio a ponerse satisfecho de que los comandantes y sus familiares dedicaran toda su sinceridad a los soldados.
					
					Recorrio ademas el dormitorio, la sala de educacion y la de leccion y ejercicio de una compania adscrita directamente a la unidad atendiendo con afecto paternal la vida de los soldados.
					
					Propuso fotografiarse junto con los comandantes de la unidad donde estuvo el Dirigente Kim Jong Il en el ultimo periodo de su vida.
					
					Les encomendo que cuidaran bien la vida de los soldados para alcanzar exitos en el ejercicio y elevar la combatividad de la unidad y perfeccionaran sin falta este ano la preparacion de combate de la unidad mediante ejercicios perseverantes y duros para cumplir el legado del Dirigente.
					
					Le acompanaron el vicemariscal del EPC, Ri Yong Ho, jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, los generales de ejercito del EPC, Kim Myong Guk, Kim Won Hong y Pak Jae Gyong, y el teniente general del EPC, Ri Tu Song.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe cesto de flores del mandatario palestino
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe cesto de flores del mandatario palestino
Pyongyang, 19 de enero (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un recibio un cesto de flores que con motivo del Ano Nuevo Lunar 101 (2012) de la Era Juche, le enviara el jefe de la Autoridad Nacional de Palestina, Mahmoud Abbas.
					El cesto fue entregado el dia 19 a un funcionario coreano por el embajador palestino en Corea, Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan.

articles.title: Otorgado a la acrobacia coreana el premio de primer lugar en Valencia
articles.content:
Otorgado a la acrobacia coreana el premio de primer lugar en Valencia
Pyongyang, 19 de enero (ACNC) -- En el VI Festival Internacional de Circo de Valencia, las piezas del circo de Corea "Aviadores", "Volemos mas alto" y "Equilibrismo sobre la cuerda" conquistaron los premios de oro, plata y bronce que corresponden al primer, segundo y tercer lugares.
					Mientras tanto, "Andar sobre la cuerda de hierro" recibio el premio tecnico.
					
					En el festival efectuado del dia 13 al 15 en Valencia de Espana participaron los acrobatas famosos de Corea, Rusia, Espana, Italia, Gran Bretana, Francia, Checo, Bulgaria, Rumania y Mexico.
					
					En la ocasion se presentaron mas de 20 piezas seleccionadas entre mas de 30 que se estrenaron en la funcion conjunta internacional de circo, transcurrida del 3 de diciembre del ano pasado al 8 de enero del ano en curso en Toros de Valencia.
					
					La ceremonia de otorgamiento de los premios tuvo lugar el dia 15.

articles.title: ACNC comenta la extremada fiebre conflictiva de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
ACNC comenta la extremada fiebre conflictiva de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 19 de enero (ACNC) -- Llega al extremo la locura del traidor Lee Myung Bak por el enfrentamiento fratricida.
					  En su recorrido del dia 18 por las unidades del frente, el dijo que el Norte "esta tomando una actitud muy belicosa" y la Peninsula Coreana es "el pais dividido donde se encuentran las fuerzas mas belicistas del mundo".
					
					  Ademas, chismeo que "hace falta una perfecta disposicion que disuada la provocacion del Norte".
					
					  Sus dichos resultan un imperdonable insulto a los enlutados del pais que pasan estos dias con el gran dolor y tristeza por haber perdido al gran Padre de la nacion (Dirigente Kim Jong Il).
					
					  La "actitud belicosa" del Norte, aludida por Lee, es la explosion de la vehemente indignacion de todos los militares y habitantes de la RPDC por la siniestra conducta de ese maniaco de enfrentamiento y guerra que insulto la maxima dignidad de la RPDC y llevo al umbral de guerra la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  Durante el duelo nacional de la connacional RPDC, la camarilla de Lee expuso mas abiertamente que nunca su siniestro intento conflictivo y atributo de basura humana.
					
					  Ordeno a todo el ejercito el "estado de alerta para el combate" y reforzo las fuerzas armadas desplegadas en los alrededores de las 5 islas del Mar Oeste de Corea y las zonas del frente.
					
					  Elaboro el "plan de emergencia" pronunciando abiertamente unos disparates muy provocativos como "es posible que el Norte cometa la provocacion para la unidad interna" y "que los comandantes de campana respondan rotundamente a la posible provocacion segun el criterio y decision propios".
					
					  Hasta los habitantes surcoreanos de diferentes sectores criticaron a la banda de titeres preguntandose asi: "?Como es posible que haga la guerra un pais enlutado?" y "?Donde estaria otro tipejo tan inmoral que se atreva a decretar el estado de alerta contra los enlutados?"
					
					  La banda de Lee cometio el peor crimen de rehusar la expresion de condolencias imputando a la maxima dignidad de la RPDC la "responsabilidad final" por el caso de hundimiento de la corbeta "Cheonan" y el de canonazos en la isla Yonphyong.
					
					  Esto hizo al ejercito y pueblo de la RPDC redoblar su voluntad de no tratarse nunca con Lee Myung Bak y ajustar la cuenta hasta el final de los tremendos crimenes de sus compinches.
					
					  Los chismes de Lee pronunciados en su reciente recorrido por las zonas del frente parten de su intento de encubrir sus crimenes cometidos durante el duelo nacional y eludir la responsabilidad por haber roto las relaciones intercoreanas y llevado al borde de guerra la situacion.
					
					  El ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC castigaran implacablemente a los maniacos de guerra que ofendieron la maxima dignidad de la RPDC y el noble sentimiento de aquellos de defenderla a costa de la vida y tratan de derrumbar el socialismo al estilo coreano.
